projects.name: Website for Podreel
projects.description: This was my first real 'job'. I worked on it for my 2022-23 winter break and am really satisfied with the result

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: This website. I created it to showcase my projects and art to friends and family.

projects.name: Weird Dodge Game
projects.description: I made this in one day becuase I was bored. It does not work on mobile, but it is super fun!

projects.name: Connect-4
projects.description: A connect-4 ai. You can still win against it but it's a fun challenge. Have fun!

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A tic tac toe game with an ai. This took me a while to figure out, but now you can't win!

projects.name: Typing Game
projects.description: I created this game to improve my typing skills. How high of a score can you get?

projects.name: Move, But Not Too Much
projects.description: My first game. Written in Python over my winter Vacation. See how much you can move.

art.name: What?
art.description: A random gif that I made. I was pretty bored and wanted to make 1-bit art.

art.name: Thank You!!!
art.description: I got 25 followers on Pixilart! This is my thank you to them. I used the blur tool to make a glow effect.

art.name: Fox With Wings
art.description: I made this for a request that someone made. Very fun to make but the wings aren't quite right.

art.name: Stretching Cat
art.description: I wanted to make a silhouette of my cat, but it was hard to see with a dark background, so I added the stars.

art.name: Snow Globe
art.description: I made this for a globe contest. The snow looks a little off, but making the cirlces was fun.

art.name: Trophy
art.description: I made this coffee mug for a trophy contest because the dictionary defines a trophy as a cup.

art.name: Magnet Gif
art.description: This is the first Gif I have ever made. It consists of 56 frames that I slowly drew in one by one.

art.name: School Bus
art.description: I made this for the first contest that I participated in. I like it but I don't like the 2d perspective.
